text: Stixis scandens is a species of liana in the family Resedaceae and the type species in its genus. No subspecies are listed in the Catalogue of Life. It is found in Indo-China; in Vietnam it may be called quã dây leo. == References == de Loureiro J (1790) In: Fl. Cochinch. 295 ==External links== * * Original illustration (plantillustrations.org) Category:Resedaceae Category:Flora of Indo-China
title: Stixis scandens
